PAGE.TITLE: Firefox
PAGE.CONTENT:
It is possible to delete remembered data (e.g. in the autocompletion of the URL, of the search field, of the form fields…) by typing when the line is selected.

open a new window
open a new tab
undo close window

display the second tab
display the third tab
display the fourth tab

close the tab
close current tab

find text as you type

Click on a link

Click on a link

Click on a link

Click on a link
save as

open all bookmarks in background tabs

scroll line by line

mozilla.comhttps://support.mozilla.org/t5/Basic-Browsing/Keyboard-shortcuts-Perform-common-Firefox-tasks-quickly/ta-p/3866
enPDF
special URLs
about:cache report the size and usage of the memory cache, disk cache and offline cache
about:cache?device=memory report the content of the memory cache
about:cache?device=disk report the content of the disk cache
about:cache?device=offline report the content of the offline cache
configuration
layout.spellcheckDefault
1: spell check only in multiple-line text boxes
2: spell check in all text boxes
browser.search.openintab
false: search result is in current tab
true: search result is in new tab
Firefox extensions
Firebughttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1843
enHTML
JS debugger
JavaScript Debugger (Venkman)http://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/216
enHTML
JavaScript debugger
YSlowhttp://developer.yahoo.com/yslow/
enHTML
performance rule checker
Live HTTP Headershttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/3829
enHTML
display HTTP headers
UnPlughttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2254
enHTML
download video or audio which is embedded on a webpage
DownloadHelperhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/3006
enHTML
yet another video downloader
Text Completehttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2320
enHTML
auto-complete text fields by using a customized lookup table
User Agent Switcherhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/59
enHTML
switch between preconfigured User Agent strings
Console²http://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1815
enHTML
improved JavaScript console
Image Zoomhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/139
enHTML
zoom images
Page Saverhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/10367
enHTML
save an entire page as PNG or JPEG
Wikipedia Lookup Extensionhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/744
enHTML
look up the selected word in Wikipedia
Morning Coffeehttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2677
enHTML
open several pages in a single click (configurable by day of the week)
Quick Locale Switcherhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1333
enHTML
quick switch to another different language
ColorfulTabshttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1368
enHTML
color the tabs
Flagfoxhttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/5791
enHTML
display location of the server
Adblock Plushttp://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865
enHTML
advertisement blocker
